NAME: Cable ships
DESCRIPTION: Cable ships

NAME: Coastguard
DESCRIPTION: Coastguard cutters, patrol ships and launches

NAME: Container ships
DESCRIPTION: Container ships, including open and closed container ships and refrigerated container ships

NAME: Dredgers
DESCRIPTION: Dredgers including bucket, hopper, grab and suction dredgers

NAME: Passenger ferries
DESCRIPTION: Passenger ferries (carrying passengers only)

NAME: Floating Production
DESCRIPTION: Floating Production and Storage Units

NAME: Fishing Vessels
DESCRIPTION: Fishing Vessels including purse seiners, long liners etc., but excluding trawlers

NAME: General Cargo
DESCRIPTION: General Cargo ships with one or more holds

NAME: Gas Tankers
DESCRIPTION: Liquefied gas carriers/tankers including LNG and LPG carriers

NAME: Icebreaking vessels
DESCRIPTION: Icebreaking vessels (dedicated vessel)

NAME: Livestock Carrier
DESCRIPTION: Livestock Carrier (dedicated ship for the carriage of livestock)

NAME: Liquid Tankers
DESCRIPTION: Liquid tankers including oil product tankers, chemical tankers and crude oil tankers (including VLCC’s and ULCC’s)

NAME: Light vessels
DESCRIPTION: Light vessels

NAME: Mobile installations
DESCRIPTION: Mobile installations, including mobile offshore drill ships, jack-up rigs, semi-submersibles

NAME: Military ships
DESCRIPTION: Military ships

NAME: Ocean Weather Ships
DESCRIPTION: Ocean Weather Ships (dedicated weather ship)

NAME: Pipe Layers
DESCRIPTION: Pipe Layers

NAME: Passenger Ships
DESCRIPTION: Passenger ships and Cruise liners

NAME: Ro Ro ferries
DESCRIPTION: Ro Ro ferries (carrying passengers and laden vehicles)

NAME: Ro Ro cargo ships
DESCRIPTION: Ro Ro cargo ships for carriage of road and/or rail vehicles and cargo, including containerised cargo

NAME: Refrigerated cargo ships
DESCRIPTION: Refrigerated cargo ships including banana ships

NAME: Research Vessels
DESCRIPTION: Research Vessels, including oceanographic, meteorological and hydrographic research ships and seismographic research ships

NAME: Sailing Vessels
DESCRIPTION: Large sailing vessels, including sail training vessels

NAME: Support vessels
DESCRIPTION: Support vessels including offshore support vessels, offshore supply vessels, stand-by vessels, pipe carriers, anchor handling vessels, buoy tenders (including coastguard vessels engaged solely on buoy tending duties), diving support vessels, etc

NAME: Trawler fishing vessels
DESCRIPTION: Trawler fishing vessels

NAME: Tugs
DESCRIPTION: Tugs, including fire-fighting tugs, salvage tugs, pusher tugs, pilot vessels, tenders etc

NAME: Vehicle Carriers
DESCRIPTION: Vehicle Carriers: dedicated multi deck ships for the carriage of new unladen road vehicles

NAME: Yachts and pleasure craft
DESCRIPTION: Yachts and pleasure craft

NAME: Other
DESCRIPTION: Other

NAME: Bulk Carriers
DESCRIPTION: Bulk Carriers, including Ore/Bulk/Oil (OBO) carriers and Ore/Oil carriers

NAME: Barges
DESCRIPTION: Barges, including crane barges and tank barges

NAME: Unknown
DESCRIPTION: Unknown, should not be used
